entities.description: An indicator showing if the date recorded in the survey is an incident date or a report date.
The specific hour during which an incident occurred.
The count of occurrences of each category without any statistical weighting.
The specific date when an incident occurred.
The specific date when an incident was reported.

relationships.description: Relates an incident to the specific hour it occurred.
Indicates whether the date recorded in the survey is an incident date or a report date.
Shows the count of each category without any statistical weighting.
Categorizes the date as an incident date when the indicator is set to incident.
Categorizes the date as a report date when the indicator is set to report.
